price: 53. Waarom zijn hem dan geen gouden armbanden gegeven of zijn er engelen met hem gestuurd?"
arabic: فَلَوۡلَآ أُلۡقِيَ عَلَيۡهِ أَسۡوِرَةٞ مِّن ذَهَبٍ أَوۡ جَآءَ مَعَهُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ مُقۡتَرِنِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: falawlā ul'qiya ʿalayhi aswiratun min dhahabin aw jāa maʿahu al-malāikatu muq'tarinīna
